string.text: BuyPatrols WARNING: DESTROYING ALL PATROLS DAILY OPTION ENABLED.
There are {PATROLSREMAINING} patrols remaining and are currently in engagement.

The {BASILPATROL_SETTLEMENT_TYPE} says they have the manpower but not the gear to send men on patrols. He tells he can send up to {BASILPATROL_MAX_PATROL_AMOUNT} patrols if you are willing to pay their gear. Your clan must own the village to hire patrols. Patrols will switch allegiance to the new clan owner if ownership changes. Disbanding patrols will only affect patrols that are not engaging an enemy. You can have a total of {BASILPATROLS_CAP_PATROLS} patrols in your clan. You have {BASILPATROLS_CAP_LEFT} patrols you can still hire for your clan.
You have hired a patrol at {BUYPATROLSCURRENTSETTLEMENT}.
Hello my lord. What do you need us to do?
We are patrolling around {BASILPATROL_AREA} under commands of {BASILPATROLS_LIEGE_0}. What do you want?
I didn't stutter. Surrender or die!
Stop right there! You're an enemy of {BASILPATROLS_LIEGE} and we shall capture you.
We can do this the easy way or the hard way.
